data.quote: The biggest problem of life what will people say if I do this.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Either you control your mind, or it will control you.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Always remember, you are much bigger than your problems.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Not a thousand, find one big reason to do what you want to do. That’s enough.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Success is not getting what you don’t have. Success is to keep going even after losing all that what you have.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: You have to be powerful, not because, you can beat others, but you have to be powerful for not to get beaten by others..
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: If you really want to be successful, stop worrying about what you can get and start focusing on what you can do.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: If the whole world says it is the palm lines due to which my fate is bad, then why can’t I change my palm lines. Remember the one without hands, they also are living their lives.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Get inspired by those who have the courage to do things that have never been done before; things that were believed to be impossible in this world.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Get inspired by those who have the courage to do things that have never been done before; things that were believed to be impossible in this world.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Stop criticizing yourself for your failures. Start appreciating yourself for your achievements.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Learn to control your thoughts or your thoughts will control you.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Be Powerful not to dominate others, but to conquer yourself.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: You are the answer to all your questions.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: The illusion of luck disappears when we start seeing things as they actually are.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: The only way to clear your mind is to stay grounded in reality.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Never be afraid to do what you love.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari

data.quote: Where there is Love there is no Fear.
data.author: Sandeep Maheshwari
